lead_paragraph: Manchester United beat Derby, 1-0, to tie Arsenal for first place in the English Premier League.Cristiano Ronaldo scored in the 76th minute. United and Arsenal each have 67 points. Kolo Toure’s late header gave Arsenal a 1-1 tie with Middlesbrough.
